author: paras25619@gmail.com
name: travel-agent
description: AI-powered travel planning assistant providing comprehensive itinerary creation, destination research, accommodation booking, activity curation, and logistical planning. Integrates Exa search for destination insights and MCP tools for Airbnb and Google Maps.

environment_variables.description: OpenAI API key for LLM calls (alternative to OpenRouter)
OpenRouter API key for LLM calls (alternative to OpenAI)
Exa API key for destination research and insights (required)
Mem0 API key for memory operations
